entry.title: My Gallery
entry.content:
My Gallery

Everyone has a special place where they can show their favorite things. My gallery is not made of paintings or sculptures, but of memories, dreams, and creativity. It is a small corner in my room where I keep drawings, crafts, and some photos of my family and friends.

I love art because it helps me express my feelings. Sometimes I draw nature, like mountains, trees, and the sky. Other times, I draw people or things I imagine. I also like to paint with bright colors because they make my gallery look cheerful and full of life.

Apart from art, I am also learning Java. I enjoy writing small computer programs and creating simple games. One day, I want to design a digital gallery using my coding skills. That way, I can share my drawings and ideas with people around the world.

My gallery is special because it shows who I am. Every picture and color tells a story about my thoughts and my world. When I look at it, I feel proud and happy. It reminds me that learning, creating, and dreaming make life beautiful.

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
“Learning without thought is labor lost; thought without learning is perilous”

Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
